data.title: DeWitt Family Information
data.text:
8.1. Elizabeth Ann DeWitt

born: 1821 - Washington, Rhea County, Tennessee

died: 1849 - Jackson, Tennessee

member of Methodist Church

married: 19 June 1838 - Paris, Henry County, Tennessee

husband: George Noble Harris

occupation: merchant

Children of Elizabeth Ann DeWitt Harris and George Noble Harris:

8.1.1. Howell DeWitt Harris

physician

8.1.2. Alice Harris

8.1.3. Elizabeth Harris

8.1.4. Ann Harris

8.1.5. John Noble Harris

Business man

8.1.6. Louanna Harris

husband: W. L. Robertson

8.2. Richard Hibbett DeWitt

never married

born: 1823 - Henry County, Tennessee

died: 1853

8.3. Clinton LaFayette DeWitt

born: 1824 - Henry County, Tennessee

died: 1837

8.4. John Blount DeWitt

physician

born: 20 April 1827 - Paris, Henry County, Tennessee

died: 12 May 1854 - Memphis, Shelby County, Tennessee

buried: Elmwood Cemetery - Memphis, Shelby County, Tennessee

married: 15 November 1848 - Memphis, Shelby County, Tennessee

wife: Sarah Ann Ables

[daughter of Joseph Ables and Amanda ?]

born: 1830 - Franklin County, Tennessee

died: 1870 - Jackson County, Texas

buried:

Children of John Blount DeWitt and Sarah Ann Ables DeWitt:

8.4.1. Mary DeWitt

8.4.2. John Brockington (Brockenton in early records) DeWitt

born: January 1852 - Marion, Crittenden County, Arkansas

died: 13 August 1902 - Austin, Travis County, Texas

buried: Oakwood Cemetery -

married: c1895

wife: Marilda Burleson Collinsworth

[daughter of Willis Bonner Collinsworth and Laura Marilda Burleson]

[widow of Mr. Percivil]

born: 15 May 1870 - Old Thompsonville, Gonzales County, Texas

died: 1957 - Austin, Travis County, Texas

Child of John Brockenton DeWitt and Marilda Burleson Collinsworth DeWitt:

8.4.2.1. John Brockington DeWitt, Jr.

born: 19 February 1902 - Austin, Travis County, Texas

died: 19 May 1983 - Austin, Travis County, Texas

buried: Oak Hill Cemetery - Smithville, Texas

1st married: 13 December 1954 - Bastrop, Texas

1st wife: Anne Brown

Children of John Brockington DeWitt, Jr. and Anne Brown DeWitt:

8.4.2.1.1. John Brockington DeWitt III

8.4.2.1.2. Charles DeWitt

2nd marriage of John Brockington DeWitt, Jr.:

2nd wife: Nannie Lee Stark

Children of John Brockington DeWitt, Jr. and Nannie Lee Stark:

8.4.2.1.3. Johnnie Lee DeWitt

8.4.2.1.4. Frank DeWitt

3rd marriage of John Brockington DeWitt, Jr.:

3rd wife: Grace Helen Teague

Children of John Brockington DeWitt, Jr. and Grace Helen Teague DeWitt:

8.4.2.1.5. Robert DeWitt

8.4.2.1.6. Debra Allison DeWitt

8.5. Alexander Smith DeWitt

never married

born: 1829 - Henry County, Tennessee

died: 1856 - Memphis, Shelby County, Tennessee

8.6. Marcus Bearden DeWitt

Cumberland Presbyterian Minister

born: 8 March 1835 - Paris, Henry County, Tennessee

died: 25 February 1901 - Nashville, Davidson County, Tennessee

buried: Old Hibbett Graveyard -

married: 13 February 1860 -

wife: Mary Elizabeth Hibbett

[daughter of John G. Hibbett and Nancy Parker]

born: 28 December 1839 - Sumner County, Tennessee

died: 16 October 1912 -

buried: Old Hibbett Graveyard -

Children of Marcus Bearden DeWitt and Mary Elizabeth Hibbett DeWitt:

8.6.1 Mary Elizabeth DeWitt

born: 8 September 1862 - near Meridianville, Madison County, Alabama

died: August 1863 - Chattanooga, Tennessee

buried 1st - Chattanooga, Hamilton County, Tennessee

buried 2nd - c1867 - Sumner County, Tennessee

8.6.2. Annie Lee DeWitt

born: 28 July 1864 - Houston County, Georgia

died: October 1865 - Meridianville, Alabama

buried 1st - Meridianville, Alabama

buried 2nd - c1867 - Sumner County, Tennessee

8.6.3. Nellie Lou DeWitt

born: 15 March 1866 - Huntsville, Alabama

died: August 1867 - Sumner County, Tennessee

buried: Sumner County, Tennessee

8.6.4. Vallie Sue DeWitt

born: 15 March 1866 - Huntsville, Alabama

died: September 1867 - Sumner County, Tennessee

buried: Sumner County, Tennessee

8.6.5 Marcie Lee DeWitt

born: 27 November 1868 - Huntsville, Alabama

died: 27 February 1950

married: 26 December 1895 - Springfield, Missouri

husband: Benjamin M. Settle

born:

died:

In 1901, B. M. Settle lived in Bowling Green, Kentucky

Children of Marcie Lee DeWitt Settle and Benjamin M. Settle:

8.6.5.1. Mary Marshall Settle

8.6.5.2. DeWitt Settle

8.6.6. John Hibbett DeWitt

Judge

born: 21 September 1872 - Sumner County, Tennessee

died: 7 March 1937 - Nashville, Davidson County, Tennessee

married: 14 November 1899 - Nashville, Davidson County, Tennessee

wife: Rebekah Williams Ward

[daughter of William Eldred Ward and Amanda Eliza Hudson]

born: 4 November 1873 - Nashville, Davidson County, Tennessee

died: 16 August 1961 - Nashville, Davidson County, Tennessee

Children of John Hibbett DeWitt and Rebekah Williams Ward DeWitt:

8.6.6.1. Ward DeWitt

born: 20 August 1900 - Nashville, Davidson County, Tennessee

died: 24 November 1971 - Nashville, Davidson County, Tennessee

married: 15 October 1924 - McMinnville, Warren County, Tennessee

wife: Elizabeth Graves Smith

[daughter of George Mead Smith and Jane Biles Whitson]

born: 20 February 1900 - McMinnville, Warren County, Tennessee

died: 14 March 1992 - Nashville, Davidson County, Tennessee

8.6.6.1.1. Ward DeWitt, Jr.

wife: Barbara Millikan

Children of Ward DeWitt, Jr. and Barbara Millikan DeWitt:

8.6.6.1.1.1. David Paul DeWitt

wife: Paula Mergenhagen

8.6.6.1.1.2. Charles Millikan DeWitt

wife: Emily Carol Wade

8.6.6.1.1.3. Barbara DeWitt

husband: Jeffrey Draughn

8.6.6.1.1.4. Ward DeWitt III

wife: Sydney Richardson

8.6.6.1.1.5. George Vance DeWitt

born: 1956

died: 1956

8.6.6.1.2. Rebecca Jane DeWitt

husband: Richard Lee Wright

Children of Rebecca Jane DeWitt Wright and Richard Lee Wright:

8.6.6.1.2.1. Elizabeth DeWitt Wright

husband: William Bennett Ralph

8.6.6.1.2.2. Richard Lee Wright, Jr.

wife: Diane Elizabeth Dunn

8.6.6.2. John Hibbett DeWitt, Jr.

born: 1906

died: 1999

1st wife: Ann Elise Martin

Children of John Hibbett DeWitt, Jr. and Ann Elise Martin DeWitt:

8.6.6.2.1. John Hibbett DeWitt III

1st wife: Karen Rice

Child of John Hibbett DeWitt III and Karen Rice DeWitt:

8.6.6.2.1.1. Margaret Elise "Ellie" DeWitt

born: 1960

2nd wife of John Hibbett DeWitt III: Elisabeth Merz

born: 17 April 1944

2nd wife of John Hibbett DeWitt, Jr.: Sykes Barbour Hewitt Neas

born: 1913

Child of John Hibbett DeWitt, Jr. and Sykes Barbour Hewitt Neas DeWitt:

8.6.6.2.2. Cary Claiborne DeWitt

husband: John Allyn

Children of Cary Claiborne DeWitt Allyn and John Allyn:

8.6.6.2.2.1. George Allyn

8.6.6.2.2.2. Jack Allyn

8.6.7. Daisy Searcy DeWitt

born: 27 January 1875 - Nashville, Davidson County, Tennessee

died: 23 November 1954

married: 18 November 1897 - Nashville, Davidson County, Tennessee

husband: William A. Skelton

[source: The Cumberland Presbyterian, December 2, 1897, page 706]

born:

died:

Children of Daisy Searcy DeWitt Skelton and William A. Skelton:

8.6.7.1. William A. Skelton

born: 1911

8.6.7.2. Elizabeth Skelton

8.6.8. Paul DeWitt

physician

born: 24 March 1878 - Nashville, Davidson County, Tenenssee

died:

8.7. William Henry DeWitt

born: 1837 - Henry County, Tenenssee

died young

8.8. Mary Louise DeWitt

born: 15 June 1839 - Holly Springs, Mississippi

died: 5 December 1921 - Georgetown, Texas

1st marriage: 1 January 1857 - Memphis, Shelby County, Tennessee

1st husband: William Thomas Yancey

born: 4 February 1830 - Oxford, North Carolina

died: 27 March 1863 - Houston, Texas

Children of William Thomas Yancey and Mary Louisa DeWitt Yancey:

8.8.1. Minnie Yancey

8.8.2. Mattie Lee Yancey

born: 29 August 1863

died: 3 March 1953

husband: Claude Somerville Snow

born: 1856

died: 1923

Child of Mattie Lee Yancey Snow and Claude Somerville Snow:

8.8.2.1. Harriet Cleo Snow

8.8.3. Robert Yancey

2nd marriage: 17 October 1867 - DeWitt County, Texas

2nd husband: William Henry Crutcher

[son of Edmund Crutcher and Jane ?]

Cumberland Presbyterian Minister

born: 9 December 1817 - Lebanon, Wilson County, Tennessee

died: 30 December 1876 - Round Rock, Texas

Children of William Henry Crutcher and Mary Louisa DeWitt Crutcher:

8.9. Brockington B. DeWitt

born: 1841 - Henry County, Tennessee

died young

8.10. DeWitt Clinton DeWitt

Cumberland Presbyterian Minister

Presbyterian Minister U.S.A. 1906-1907

born: 20 February 1844 - Henry County, Tennessee

died: 1 January 1907 - West, McLennan County, Texas

buried:

1st marriage: DeWitt County, Texas

1st wife: Millie Ann Brown

[daughter of ? Brown and ? ?]

born: 1851 - Mississippi

died: 1869 - Texas

buried:

Child of DeWitt Clinton DeWitt and Millie Ann Brown DeWitt:

8.10.1.

2nd marriage of DeWitt Clinton DeWitt: Lavaca, Texas

2nd wife of DeWitt Clinton DeWitt: Frances L. "Fannie" Hargrove

[she was the widow of ? Dickinson, and they had 2 children]

born: 21 May 1846 - Houston County, Georgia

died: 7 October 1925 - Willsboro, Texas

Children of DeWitt Clinton DeWitt and Frances L. "Fannie" Hargrove DeWitt:

8.10.2. Fannie May DeWitt

died at age 3

8.10.3. John DeWitt

8.10.4. Mark H. DeWitt

8.10.5. Frank DeWitt

8.10.6. Nettie DeWitt
